description: This table contains a history of the edits made to the list of medications attached to a medication assistance program tracker.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the program tracker record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated update for the tracker. Along with FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID, this forms the foreign key link to the FIN_ASST_TRKR_UPDATE_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple medication lines associated with the tracker and update from the FIN_ASST_TRKR_UPDATE_HX table.

columns.name: MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: History of the list of medications that the medication assistance program covers after an update is made to the tracker.
